name: Bounty Journey
description:
You're a bounty hunter. You need to deliver a living creature, but for that, you must travel over dangerous floors of a building to reach your destination. However, pay attention to enemies who wish to steal your delivery. Keep the creature alive! 

Submission to Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive.

Mechanics:

- Drop the creature to attack. You can't attack while holding the creature.

- Don't let the enemies take the creature from you! Hit them to make it drop the creature!

- You can't let the creatue on the ground for too long, or you lose!

- The more the creature stays on the ground, the more it gets scared. If the fear bar fills up, you lose!

-KEEP THE CREATURE ALIVE!

Controls:

Arrows - Move.

Spacebar- Jump.

Z - Attack.

X - Drop or take the creature.

C (HOLD) - Interact with elevator.
